snippet.title: Persona 4 Arena Ultimax — Announcement Trailer | Steam, PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
The Midnight Channel is back – and more brutal than ever! Face off against old friends and foes in the P-1 CLIMAX, and experience the thrilling continuation of the Persona 4 Golden story! 

Persona 4 Arena Ultimax suplexes onto Steam, PlayStation 4, and Nintendo Switch on March 17, 2022! 

Pre-order the Midnight Channel Collection on Steam for a special discount and get access to Persona 4 Golden today! https://bit.ly/3lR94Z0
